statements: SELECT * FROM knowledge_assets;
SELECT title, description FROM knowledge_assets WHERE parent_asset_id IS NULL;
SELECT title, description FROM knowledge_assets WHERE knowledge_asset_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426655440000';
SELECT * FROM knowledge_assets ORDER BY title ASC;
SELECT * FROM knowledge_assets WHERE description LIKE '%example%';
SELECT * FROM knowledge_assets WHERE knowledge_asset_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT title, description FROM knowledge_assets WHERE description IS NOT NULL ORDER BY title ASC;
SELECT DISTINCT parent_asset_id FROM knowledge_assets WHERE description LIKE '%database%';
SELECT title, description FROM knowledge_assets WHERE title LIKE '%SQL%' AND parent_asset_id IS NULL ORDER BY title DESC, knowledge_asset_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM knowledge_assets WHERE parent_asset_id IS NOT NULL AND title ILIKE '%example%' ORDER BY knowledge_asset_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM KnowledgeAssets;
SELECT asset_id, asset_name FROM KnowledgeAssets WHERE asset_type = 'Document';
SELECT * FROM KnowledgeAssets WHERE creation_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY creation_date DESC;
SELECT asset_name, asset_type FROM KnowledgeAssets WHERE asset_type IN ('Video', 'Audio');
SELECT asset_name, creation_date FROM KnowledgeAssets ORDER BY creation_date LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM KnowledgeAssets WHERE asset_type = 'document';
SELECT asset_name, creation_date FROM KnowledgeAssets ORDER BY creation_date DESC;
SELECT asset_name, asset_type FROM KnowledgeAssets WHERE creation_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT asset_name, COUNT(*) AS link_count FROM KnowledgeAssets INNER JOIN AssetLinks ON KnowledgeAssets.asset_id = AssetLinks.source_asset_id GROUP BY asset_name;
SELECT * FROM AssetLinks WHERE link_strength > 0.5 ORDER BY link_strength DESC, link_type;
SELECT * FROM SemanticNetwork;
SELECT asset_title, asset_type, asset_description FROM KnowledgeAssets;
SELECT from_asset_id, to_asset_id, relationship_type FROM Relationships ORDER BY relationship_type DESC;
SELECT network_name, creation_date FROM SemanticNetwork WHERE network_name = 'ExampleNetwork';
SELECT * FROM KnowledgeAssets WHERE asset_type = 'Tutorial'
SELECT * FROM KnowledgeAssets WHERE asset_type = 'Document' ORDER BY asset_title DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT asset_id, asset_title, asset_description FROM KnowledgeAssets WHERE asset_type = 'Video' ORDER BY asset_id;
SELECT * FROM Relationships WHERE from_asset_id = 'c446536e-e41a-4b5f-9f11-49319a7b3fc5' AND to_asset_id = '36fc9001-c029-4857-8919-0d48fcabe4b4';
SELECT network_id, network_name, creation_date FROM SemanticNetwork WHERE creation_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31' ORDER BY creation_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM KnowledgeAssets JOIN Relationships ON KnowledgeAssets.asset_id = Relationships.to_asset_id WHERE Relationships.relationship_type = 'Linked' ORDER BY asset_title ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM knowledge_assets;
SELECT asset_name, asset_type FROM knowledge_assets WHERE asset_id = 1;
SELECT source_name FROM information_sources ORDER BY source_id DESC;
SELECT asset_id, asset_name, source_id FROM asset_links WHERE link_type = 'related';
SELECT * FROM knowledge_assets WHERE asset_type = 'document' ORDER BY asset_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM knowledge_assets;
SELECT asset_name, asset_type FROM knowledge_assets WHERE asset_id = 1;
SELECT source_name, source_type FROM information_sources WHERE source_id IN (2, 3, 4);
SELECT a.asset_name, s.source_name, al.link_type FROM knowledge_assets a JOIN asset_links al ON a.asset_id = al.asset_id JOIN information_sources s ON al.source_id = s.source_id;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_links FROM asset_links WHERE link_type = 'reference';
SELECT * FROM KnowledgeAssets;
SELECT id, asset_name FROM KnowledgeAssets WHERE id = 1;
SELECT * FROM Concepts WHERE concept_id = 3;
SELECT tag_name FROM Tags ORDER BY tag_id DESC;
SELECT asset_name, description FROM KnowledgeAssets WHERE id IN (1, 2, 3);
SELECT * FROM KnowledgeAssets;
SELECT id, asset_name FROM KnowledgeAssets WHERE description IS NOT NULL;
SELECT link_id, source_asset_id, target_asset_id FROM Links ORDER BY link_id DESC;
SELECT concept_id, concept_name, description FROM Concepts WHERE concept_name LIKE '%database%' OR concept_name LIKE '%schema%';
SELECT tag_id, tag_name FROM Tags WHERE tag_name IN ('SQL','database','schema') ORDER BY tag_name ASC;
